Vulnerable.description: Target takes 50% more damage from attacks
Vulnerable.duration: Decrements by 1 at end of target's turn

Weak.description: Target deals 25% less damage from attacks
Weak.duration: Decrements by 1 at end of target's turn

Strength.description: Increases attack damage by 1 per stack

Frail.description: Target gains 25% less block from cards
Frail.duration: Decrements by 1 at end of target's turn

Dexterity.description: Increases block gain by 1 per stack

Poison.description: At START of poisoned creature's turn, lose HP equal to Poison stacks, then Poison decreases by 1
Poison.timing: START of poisoned creature's turn (before enemy actions)
Poison.blocked_by: Artifact blocks application, not existing poison
Poison.notes: Poison damage bypasses Block completely. Occurs before enemy takes its action.

Burn.description: Status card that deals 2 damage when in hand at end of turn

Block.duration: Expires at start of player's next turn (unless modified)
Block.notes: Block is applied after damage modifications

Artifact.description: Negates the application of a single debuff
Artifact.behavior: Consumes 1 stack per debuff application EVENT, not magnitude
Artifact.example: 5 Vulnerable applied = 1 Artifact consumed, 0 Vulnerable applied
Artifact.notes: Does not prevent damage, only debuffs

Intangible.description: Reduce ALL HP loss to 1 this turn
Intangible.duration: Until end of turn, decrements by 1
Intangible.notes: Does not reduce HP loss to less than 1

Plated Armor.description: Gain Block at end of turn equal to stacks
Plated Armor.removal: Lose 1 stack when receiving unblocked attack damage

Metallicize.description: At end of turn, gain Block equal to stacks

Buffer.description: Negate the next time HP would be lost

Ritual.description: At end of turn, gain Strength equal to stacks

Thorns.description: When attacked, deal damage back to attacker
Thorns.notes: Does not trigger on non-attack damage

Regeneration.description: At end of turn, heal HP equal to stacks, then reduce by 1

Barricade.description: Block is not removed at the start of your turn

Focus.description: Increases passive and evoke values of Orbs (except Plasma)
Focus.note: Focus does NOT affect Plasma orbs

Channel.description: Add an Orb to the rightmost empty slot
Channel.overflow: If full, evokes leftmost Orb first

Evoke.description: Remove and trigger the leftmost Orb's evoke effect
Evoke.notes: Evoke values are modified by Focus

Lightning Orb.passive: Deal 3+Focus damage to random enemy at end of turn

Frost Orb.passive: Gain 2+Focus Block at end of turn

Dark Orb.evoke: Deal accumulated damage to enemy with lowest HP

Plasma Orb.passive: Gain 1 Energy at start of turn
Plasma Orb.note: Plasma orbs are NOT affected by Focus - values are always fixed

Calm.description: Safe stance with energy bonus on exit

Divinity.description: Triple damage with energy bonus, auto-exits
Divinity.on_exit: Automatic at start of next turn

Mantra.behavior: At 10+ Mantra, enter Divinity and lose 10 Mantra

Exhaust.description: When played, remove from deck for remainder of combat

Ethereal.description: If in hand at end of turn, Exhaust this card
Ethereal.notes: Must be played to avoid exhausting

Innate.description: Starts in your hand at the beginning of combat
Innate.order: Innate cards drawn before normal draw

Retain.description: This card is not discarded at end of turn

X Cost.notes: Affected by Double Energy, Ice Cream

Scry.description: Look at top X cards of draw pile, may discard any
Scry.notes: Discarded cards go to discard pile

Upgrade.description: Improve a card's stats or effects
Upgrade.permanent: Until end of combat or permanent to deck

Transform.description: Replace a card with a random card of same type
Transform.notes: Transformed card is removed from deck

Curses.removal: Must be removed at shop or Rest Site
